articles.title: Mass. actually had 4 tornadoes Saturday, says National Weather Service
articles.description:
NWS Boston said the twisters were associated with a severe thunderstorm that tore through the area.

The post Mass. actually had 4 tornadoes Saturday, says National Weather Service appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: National Weather Service confirmed four tornadoes hit Massachusetts on Saturday.
The tornadoes were linked to a severe thunderstorm affecting the Boston area.
Residents should prepare for potential severe weather alerts in the future.

articles.title: New on Netflix and more: Top streaming picks in September
articles.description:
A mix of older movies and new shows streaming now.

The post New on Netflix and more: Top streaming picks in September appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Discover new streaming options on Netflix for Boston residents this September.
Watch popular shows like 'The Crown' and movies like 'The Social Network' now available.
Enjoy diverse entertainment choices that cater to various interests in the Boston area.

articles.title: On the hunt for sharks in Boston Harbor
articles.description:
Researchers are working to tag and study young sand tiger sharks that come to Massachusetts waters year after year.

The post On the hunt for sharks in Boston Harbor appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Researchers are tagging young sand tiger sharks in Boston Harbor for study.
Massachusetts waters attract these sharks annually, indicating a healthy marine ecosystem.
Local fishermen and residents may benefit from increased shark population awareness.

articles.title: Police seek help finding alleged shooter who escaped on scooter
articles.description:
The victim sustained serious injuries in the Aug. 16 Dorchester shooting.

The post Police seek help finding alleged shooter who escaped on scooter appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police are searching for a shooter involved in an Aug. 16 incident in Dorchester.
The victim suffered serious injuries from the shooting, raising community safety concerns.
Residents are urged to provide information to aid in the investigation.

articles.title: Garrett Crochet, Trevor Story power Red Sox to a 7-0 win over the Athletics
articles.description:
Crochet did not walk a batter for the third straight game.

The post Garrett Crochet, Trevor Story power Red Sox to a 7-0 win over the Athletics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox defeated the Athletics 7-0 on September 9, 2025.
Garrett Crochet achieved his third consecutive game without a walk.
Trevor Story's performance boosts team morale ahead of upcoming games.
